backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Drone X Solutions backend, defining data types and CRUD operations for homepage content, services, testimonials, gallery images, booking requests, and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing short summaries of three frontend source files: App.tsx, AdminGalleryTab.tsx, and AdminBookingsTab.tsx.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Drone X Solutions frontend app, mounting the React app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry point that configures TanStack Router with a root layout route containing home (`/`) and admin (`/admin`) child routes.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: React component rendering the About section of the homepage, displaying fetched about text alongside team/drone images and a grid of four company highlight cards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays all booking requests in expandable cards with contact details, and provides quick reply actions via email or WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGalle: Admin tab for managing before/after gallery image pairs, supporting file upload with progress tracking, addition, and removal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHomep: Admin form for editing homepage content fields (hero title, subtitle, CTA text, about text, and hero image) with save and upload progress support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminServi: Admin tab for managing services with add, edit, and delete functionality, falling back to a set of default services if none are stored.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Admin tab for creating, editing, and deleting customer testimonials including rating, service, and location fields.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: React component that gates its children behind Internet Identity authentication and admin privilege checks, showing login or access-denied UI as appropriate.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: React component rendering a booking request form with fields for name, email, phone, service type, location, date, and message, submitting to the backend and showing a success state on completion.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: React component displaying the Contact section with phone, email, location info, social media links, and a WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a before/after gallery section fetching images from the backend, falling back to placeholder data, with each card allowing toggling between before and after images.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the full-screen hero section with a dynamic background image, CMS-driven title/subtitle/CTA text, stats, and scroll-to-section buttons.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the app shell with a fixed header, responsive navigation (desktop and mobile), admin link for admin users, and renders child content below.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, toggling state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
Displays a grid of drone cleaning services fetched from the backend, falling back to a hardcoded default list with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders a testimonials section with star ratings fetched from the backend, falling back to placeholder customer reviews when no data is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, initializing admin access control when an identity is present.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Hook that combines identity and admin-check query to expose whether the current caller is an authenticated admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for all backend actor operations including homepage content, services, testimonials, gallery images, and bookings.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS layers, and defines a dark industrial theme using OKLCH CSS custom properties along with utility classes for gradients, hover effects, and brand styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page protected by AdminGuard that renders tabbed content management sections for homepage, services, testimonials, gallery, and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public-facing home page that composes all main sections: hero, services, booking form, about, testimonials, gallery, and contact.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark industrial theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom brand colors (navy, accent-yellow, accent-orange), typography/container-queries plugins, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 5) for the Drone X Solutions website, including feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for a drone cleaning business site with admin panel and multi-language support.
